Author: vanishedintofatair
Text: From an adult child of a stupid mother, I send you my sympathies.  My mom used to say the stupidest things that were so incredibly hurtful and she had no clue. She never meant to be be cruel, she is just really stupid sometimes.   I imagine that what she really means is that if she ate like that she would get fat. And it's possible that she doesn't even see your suffering.  Or she is in denial about it.  I'm so sorry for what you have to put up with
